He wrote: ‚ÄúI do not believe that Iowa and other states need politicians in Washington, D.C. dictating and controlling how states run their elections.‚Äù

RT @XFreeze: ELON MUSK: WE ARE REALLY TRYING TO BRING THE WORLD TOGETHER INTO A COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS

ùïè is kind of a global town square‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
ELON MUSK: WE ARE REALLY TRYING TO BRING THE WORLD TOGETHER INTO A COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS

ùïè is kind of a global town square where people can say what they want to say with words, pictures, video

Where there's a secure messaging system we've recently added the ability to do audio and video calls

So really trying to bring the world together into a collective consciousness

And that's different from just saying, 'What is the most dopamine-generating video stream that one could make?' Which I think can be a little bit of brain rot

If you're just watching videos that cause dopamine hits one after another but lack substance, then I think that's not a great way to spend time

tweets.text: Insurance is half price when Tesla self-driving is activated, because it increases safety so much

quoted.text:
NEWS: U.S. insurer Lemonade has announced that it will offer a 50% rate cut for drivers of @Tesla vehicles when FSD is steering because it had data showing it reduced accidents.

‚ÄúA car that sees 360 degrees, never gets drowsy, and reacts in milliseconds can‚Äôt be compared to a human. Beyond the product announcement today, we‚Äôre also announcing our commitment to the Tesla community ‚Äì the safer FSD software becomes, the more our prices will drop,‚Äù said Shai Wininger, co-founder and president at Lemonade.
